mapper.sql: userid, firstname, middlename, lastname, username, status, create_time, gender, password
mapper.insert:
insert into user
userid,
firstname,
middlename,
lastname,
username,
status,
create_time,
gender,
password,
#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{middlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update user
firstname = #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
middlename = #{middlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastname = #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set firstname = #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middlename = #{middlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastname = #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
